General.Name: Buyung Poetra Sembada Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Buyung Poetra Sembada Tbk manufactures and trades in rice and its derivative products in Indonesia. The company distributes rice through supermarkets and minimarkets under the Topikoki, Rumah Limas, Belida, BPS, Daily Meal, and HOKI brand names. It also engages in the trade, construction, industry, land transportation, workshop, agriculture and service, and printing businesses; financial and insurance, professional, scientific, and technical activities; and rental of power plants. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in East Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Buyung Poetra Sembada Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Buyung Investama Gemilang.
General.Address: Pasar Induk Beras Cipinang Block K No.17, Jakarta Timur, Indonesia, 13240
